name: Oakley Holbrook Sunglasses
description: Classic Oakley Holbrook sunglasses with a timeless design inspired by the surf and skate culture. Features durable O Matter frame construction and provides excellent UV protection for everyday wear.

name: Ray-Ban Wayfarer Classic
description: Iconic Ray-Ban Wayfarer sunglasses that defined a generation. These classic frames offer timeless style with crystal-clear lenses and comfortable fit, perfect for any face shape.

name: Persol PO3019S Steve McQueen
description: Vintage-inspired Persol sunglasses made famous by Steve McQueen. Handcrafted Italian acetate frames with distinctive arrow hinges and superior Meflecto system for maximum comfort.

name: Gucci GG0061S Oversized
description: Luxurious oversized Gucci sunglasses featuring the iconic double G logo. These glamorous frames combine Italian craftsmanship with contemporary style, perfect for making a fashion statement.

name: Maui Jim Peahi Polarized
description: High-performance Maui Jim sunglasses with patented PolarizedPlus2 lens technology. Designed for active lifestyles, these frames offer superior glare reduction and enhanced color contrast.

name: Tom Ford Cliff Aviators
description: Sophisticated Tom Ford aviator sunglasses with sleek metal construction and premium lenses. These luxury frames embody modern elegance with attention to detail and superior craftsmanship.

name: Prada PR01OS Conceptual
description: Contemporary Prada sunglasses from the Conceptual collection. Features geometric frames with distinctive Prada logo detailing and gradient lenses for a modern, sophisticated look.

name: Dior Homme BlackTie
description: Elegant Dior Homme BlackTie sunglasses combining classic sophistication with modern design elements. Premium acetate construction with subtle logo branding for refined luxury appeal.

name: Versace VE2150Q Medusa
description: Bold Versace sunglasses featuring the iconic Medusa logo and Greek key detailing. These statement frames combine Italian luxury with distinctive baroque-inspired design elements.

name: Aviator Nation Retro Round
description: Vintage-inspired round sunglasses with gold-tone metal frames and tinted lenses. These retro-chic frames capture the essence of 70s California cool with modern UV protection technology.

name: Warby Parker Harper Square
description: Modern square-frame sunglasses crafted from premium acetate with anti-reflective coating. These contemporary frames offer a perfect blend of style and functionality for everyday wear.

name: Celine CL40019I Cat-Eye
description: Sophisticated cat-eye sunglasses from Celine's luxury collection. Features distinctive angular frames with gradient lenses and subtle logo detailing for an effortlessly chic Parisian look.

name: Oliver Peoples O'Malley Sun
description: Classic keyhole bridge sunglasses with handcrafted Italian acetate frames. These vintage-inspired glasses feature premium Carl Zeiss lenses and represent timeless American optical heritage.

name: Bottega Veneta BV1035S
description: Minimalist luxury sunglasses featuring Bottega Veneta's signature intrecciato weave pattern on the temples. These understated frames embody Italian craftsmanship and contemporary elegance.

name: Carrera Champion Retro
description: Sporty aviator-style sunglasses with distinctive Carrera design heritage. Features lightweight metal construction with rubber temple tips and high-performance lenses for active lifestyles.

name: Saint Laurent SL 276 MICA
description: Bold geometric sunglasses from Saint Laurent's rock-chic collection. These statement frames feature sharp angles and dark lenses, perfect for channeling Parisian attitude and modern glamour.

name: Moscot Lemtosh Sun
description: Iconic New York eyewear with thick acetate frames and keyhole nose bridge. These handcrafted sunglasses represent over 100 years of Moscot family tradition and timeless downtown style.

name: Gentle Monster Dreamer
description: Avant-garde Korean design meets futuristic styling in these unique oversized frames. Features experimental proportions and innovative materials for fashion-forward individuals seeking distinctive eyewear.

name: Costa Del Mar Blackfin
description: Performance fishing sunglasses with polarized 580 lens technology for superior clarity on the water. Lightweight bio-resin construction with hydrolite grips ensures all-day comfort during outdoor adventures.
